ssl.description: Full SSL/TLS encryption (requires SSL certificate on origin)

always_use_https.description: Redirect all HTTP requests to HTTPS

automatic_https_rewrites.description: Automatically rewrite HTTP URLs to HTTPS

rocket_loader.description: Keep off for better compatibility with React/Next.js

challenge_ttl.description: Challenge TTL for bot protection (1 hour)

hotlink_protection.description: Prevent other sites from hotlinking images

early_hints.description: Enable Early Hints for faster page loads

page_rules.description: Force HTTPS for all HTTP traffic

firewall_rules.description: Block WordPress and PHP requests (not used by Next.js)

rate_limiting.description: Rate limit API to 50 requests per minute per IP

notes.mailgun: MX and TXT records for txt.emailtotextnotify.com must not be proxied
notes.clerk: Clerk authentication CNAMEs must not be proxied
notes.vercel: Main domain can be proxied through Cloudflare for CDN benefits
